Journal of Neural Systems Associate editor of IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging, Pattern Recognition, and Pattern Analysis and Applications Conference organization: Organizer of GCPR2014, GbR2011, CAIP2009 in MÃ¼nster General/Program Chair for international conferences (GCPR2019, MECBME2018,Â  ICPRAI2018, GbR2013, ICCH2012, WDIA2012, CMLS2010, ICMB2010, WMMP2010, ICMB2008, WMMP2008, Cyberworlds2008, IWICPAS2006) Co-Chair of "Pattern Recognition in Life Sciences and Natural Sciences" Track at GCPR2018, "Biomedical Image Analysis and Applications" Track at ICPR2016, "Computer Vision" Track at ICPR2010 Honorary Chair of ICMS2019, MCPR2016 Community services: Member of the Governing Board of IAPR (International Association of Pattern Recognition) Chair of TC 15 "Graph-based Representations in Pattern Recognition" of IAPR (2012 - 2016) Executive Board Member and Speaker of the Technical Committee of DAGM (German Association for Pattern Recognition) Member of IEEE-EMBS Technical Committee on Biomedical Imaging and Image Processing (BIIP) Other activities: Invited & Keynote speaker at APPIS2020, IWPR2018, ICPRAM2018, PSIVT2017, MCPR2015, CAIP2013, ICHB2011 Principal Investigator of the Cluster of Excellence "Cells in Motion" funded by the German Excellence Initiative Board member of Collaborative Research Center "Molecular Cardiovascular Imaging" Member of the Senate of University of MÃ¼nster (2014 - 2016) Dean of Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science, University of MÃ¼nster (since November 2016) Research: Image analysis (biomedical, 3D), pattern recognition, machine learning Most of the computer science related publications can be found at DBLP The biomedical publications are listed at PubMed Google Scholar Citations (related Guide2Research entry) Just for fun: My ErdÃ¶s number is 3: Xiaoyi Jiang â JÃ¡nos Csirik â Noga Alon â Paul ErdÃ¶s (based on the AMS collaboration distance calculator)
